price: Ṣé àwọn tó ṣàì gbàgbọ́ lérò pé àwọn yóò mú àwọn ẹrúsìn Mi ní alátìlẹ́yìn lẹ́yìn Mi ni? Dájúdájú Àwa pèsè iná Jahanamọ sílẹ̀ ní ibùdésí fún àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́.
arabic: أَفَحَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَن يَتَّخِذُواْ عِبَادِي مِن دُونِيٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَۚ إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا جَهَنَّمَ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ نُزُلٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: afaḥasiba alladhīna kafarū an yattakhidhū ʿibādī min dūnī awliyāa innā aʿtadnā jahannama lil'kāfirīna nuzulan
